data.current_summary: Get product sample custom column value related to this importation.
data.current_description: /!\ Use this operation only when you just changed the custom column expression and you want to get a precise the property value. Otherwise use the operation Importation_GetProductSample which will give you all property values
data.summary_suggestion: Get custom column value for product sample
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves the calculated value of a specific custom column for a product sample within an importation execution. This operation is optimized for retrieving a single custom column value after modifying the column expression, allowing you to verify the calculation result without fetching all columns. Returns the computed custom column value for the specified product sample. For retrieving multiple column values, use Importation_GetProductSample instead.

data.current_summary: Send harvest request for an Account
data.summary_suggestion: Request order data harvest from marketplace account
data.description_suggestion: Initiates a harvest operation to synchronize and retrieve new orders from the specified marketplace account. Returns confirmation of the harvest request initiation.

data.current_summary: Get the meta information about the order (ETag, Last-Modified)
data.current_description:
The purpose of this operation is to reduce the bandwith usage by getting just the meta information about the order (ETag, Last-Modified) with the body.
This could be useful
data.summary_suggestion: Check order metadata without retrieving full data
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves HTTP metadata headers (ETag, Last-Modified, Content-Length) for an order without downloading the full order body. This HEAD request is useful for bandwidth optimization when checking if an order has been modified since the last retrieval, or for cache validation. Returns only headers; no response body is included. Useful for conditional requests and change detection.

data.summary_suggestion: Clear merchant-specific order information
data.description_suggestion: Clears or resets merchant-specific information associated with an order, such as merchant order references, internal tracking codes, or custom merchant notes. This operation removes the merchant's custom data from the order while preserving marketplace order data. Side effect: The order's merchant information will be permanently cleared and cannot be recovered. Useful for resetting order metadata or removing outdated merchant references.

data.current_summary: Mark an order incident as resolved
data.summary_suggestion: Resolve an order incident
data.description_suggestion: Marks an open incident or issue associated with an order as resolved or closed. This operation updates the incident status and may trigger notifications to relevant parties. Requires the incident details in the request body (closeIncidentRequest). Side effect: The incident status changes from open to closed, and the order's incident flag is cleared. Useful for incident management workflows and order status tracking.
